entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
